name: Virtual Insanity (itch)
description:
Virtual Insanity is a first person psychological horror game created for Oculus Rift. You take on the roll of a Doctor and enter a nightmare where you will lose your sense of reality and fight terrifying zombies along with solving a puzzle in order to escape. Have you lost your mind? Or has the world around you gone mad?

Built from the ground up for the Oculus Rift.

II started creating this game in October of 2015. This is my first full game and 3rd Unity project, Please leave feedback and report any bugs you come across. I will be making a "Part 2" of this game if enough people are intrested.
